materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"8qt0o","text":"PLRP-S 5-μm particles 1,000-Å pore size (Agilent Technologies)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8vubl","text":"Water Optima LC/MS Grade (Fisher Scientific #W64)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"di7hr","text":"Acetonitrile Optima LC/MS Grade (Fisher Scientific #A955-4)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9dk4k","text":"Formic Acid LC/MS Grade (Thermo Scientific #28905)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"49gc2","text":"15 μm SilicaTip PicoTip Emitter (New Object #FS360-50-15-N-20-C12)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"df93o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4mbnm","text":"Buffer A: 94.8 % water, 5 % acetonitrile, 0.2 % formic acid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fq7eu","text":"Buffer B: 4.8 % water, 95 % acetonitrile, 0.2 % formic acid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cru2l","text":"Samples were analyzed on a Thermo Scientific Orbitrap Fusion Lumos Tribrid mass spectrometer in line with a Dionex Ultimate 3000 RSLCnano system","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b6nta","text":"Samples (  ) were injected via the autosampler and loaded onto a self-packed trap column (150 μm i.d. x 2 cm length packed with PLRP-S 5-μm particles 1,000-Å pore size) for   with 100% loading buffer (94.8% water:5% acetonitrile:0.2% formic acid) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":173,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7frkd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"6","guid":"AC2A9A300FC111EB806F6DB7DB19E079","id":"71214","label":"","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"2A6A3E500FC211EB806F6DB7DB19E079","id":"68150","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"faanp","text":"Eluted proteins were ionized in positive ion mode nanoelectrospray ionization (nESI) using a pulled tip nanospray emitter (15-μm i.d. ×125 mm) packed with 1mm of PLRP-S 5-μm particles 1,000-Å pore size with a custom nano-source (https://proteomicsresource.washington.edu/docs/protocols05/UWPR_NSI_Source.pdf).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":229,"length":78}],"data":{}},{"key":"40pav","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cp3me","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8r31m","text":"
